system.description: Phraints are from the southern Teriock deserts and have a hive-like culture in which they are constantly serving the queen. Phraints do not feel emotions though they are often "afraid" of water and incapable of swimming. Most common phraints are green and incapable of going mage, though rarely there are red phraints which must go mage and only resist fear. Phraint Queenâ€™s are gold and extremely rare and the only type that can show emotion (no fear protection).
system.appearance: Phraints look like sexless insectoid people. They are like praying mantises, but with only two arms and two legs.

overview.base: You are incapable of training to be a semi and you lose any semi ranks you already have.
You are incapable of training to be a warrior and you lose any warrior ranks you already have.
You have no swim speed. This overrides abilities such as Swimming.
You are immune to being frightened.
Armor you wear must be custom-made to fit you.
You vertically leap at quarter speed and horizontally leap at half speed.
overview.proficient: You instead vertically leap at half speed and horizontally leap at full speed.

overview.base: You always have at least 2 AV. This is the case even when you are not wearing armor.
